Test Name: MYD88 Reflex to CXCR4 Mutation Detection
Specimen Type: Peripheral blood or bone marrow aspirate
Purpose: To detect MYD88 gene mutations and, if positive, reflexively test for CXCR4 mutations to aid in molecular diagnostic assessment.
Equipment: Real-time PCR thermocycler, DNA extraction system, centrifuge, spectrophotometer/fluorometer
